title: Koo Za Rot Zab
overview: The heroine's family owns the largest in Isan company for the production of fermented fish, but when the heroine returns from abroad after graduation, the family business is failing and is on the verge of bankruptcy. To overcome the crisis, she decides to lead the company and to begin to borrow money from a friend of his father. However, in their generosity toward each requested that the heroine was married to his son, full of failure and a playboy, did not miss a single skirt. Intelligent and educated heroine is not interested in sloppy hero from the other side and she was not his type. They marry, but because of the constant quarrels of their marriage bursting at the seams. Sister of the hero who likes the heroine, doing everything to bring them together. Overcoming many difficulties and misunderstandings, these two will fall in love with each other.
